entries.speaker: ellie
entries.text: hi i am ellie thanks for coming in today i was created to talk to people in a safe and secure environment i am not a therapist but i am here to learn about people and would love to learn about you i will ask a few questions to get us started and please feel free to tell me anything your answers are totally confidential are you ok with this

entries.speaker: participant
entries.text: i am

entries.speaker: ellie
entries.text: okay so how are you doing today

entries.speaker: participant
entries.text: i feel pretty good i am wide awake i had an good breakfast and a nice cup of coffee and i have an easy day today so i am just gonna chat with you then i am going to the gym and run some errands so i plan on having a nice day today

entries.speaker: ellie
entries.text: that is good where are you from originally

entries.speaker: participant
entries.text: i was born and raised in los angeles and i am one of the few locals from around here and i went to school away and but i am one of the few natives that are actually in los angeles

entries.speaker: ellie
entries.text: really

entries.speaker: participant
entries.text: yes i am

entries.speaker: ellie
entries.text: tell me about a situation that you wish you had handled differently

entries.speaker: participant
entries.text: hm there is one recently my father passed away recently

entries.speaker: ellie
entries.text: i am sorry

entries.speaker: participant
entries.text: thank you and really because in our religion you know you plan a funeral very quickly you know typically within a couple of days and i really only invited very very close friends and family members i was more or less in charge of it my dad was remarried but his widow was sort of not really up to it so i took care of it and i wish i had invited a i kept it very private and really just told people after the fact that he knew that would have liked to have come tp the service had they known about it so i really only invited because just the time pressure really just a handful of people but now as time is passed i wish i would invited more of his friends instead of just two or three close friends you know ten or twenty acquaintances and people he knew from business or over the years and i really just and even distant family members i really just told after the fact i really did not invite them because i was under a time pressure but i could have easily done it via email or it is hard to call everybody personally but i wish that is something cause people have expressed a little they were upset with me when my other family members threw it all back at me oh you did not tell me notil after the fact that you know so and so had passed so they all threw it at me because i was more or less doing it so i wish i i did that differently but i did the best i could at the time so i am not really mad at myself about something i probably should have been more prepared for also something that was coming was inevitable so

entries.speaker: ellie
entries.text: i see tell me about your relationship with your family

entries.speaker: participant
entries.text: well both my parents are recently deceased in the last couple of years and i had a brother that i have three younger brothers one of who passed away in december and we are not super close like i always like i look at other families we were just never like that norman rockwell painting i guess we are also different

entries.speaker: ellie
entries.text: h

entries.speaker: participant
entries.text: and i have a close relationship with friends and a more distant relationship with family not that it is strange but i wish it was more like boy one of those families that got together every sunday and had dinner and all that we just never did that because we are all all so different

entries.speaker: ellie
entries.text: yeah i understand

entries.speaker: participant
entries.text: yeah it is yeah just being that is how it is but you know to strangers and most people i just say you know howdy the family everybody is great you know but i think every family has their own sort of stuff

entries.speaker: ellie
entries.text: have you ever been diagnosed with ptsd

entries.speaker: participant
entries.text: no but i thought probably i could have had it before from some other events in my life and i just was not sure i have had been to some therapy in the past just from you know i was in the military and i was never really sure if that that is exactly what it was but i think i function pretty well but i just was not sure that i had been to some therapy and counseling over the years

entries.speaker: ellie
entries.text: why would you decide to enlist in the military

entries.speaker: participant
entries.text: i did not enlist i was an officer i went to one of the service academies

entries.speaker: ellie
entries.text: how old were you when you joined the military

entries.speaker: participant
entries.text: that seventeen i started when after high school and i went to a service academy so it is more prestige it just is not enlisting it is the hard where i went it is the hardest school in america to get into

entries.speaker: ellie
entries.text: how have you been feeling lately

entries.speaker: participant
entries.text: i feel pretty good lately you know i have been like anybody else more periods of blue in your life but boy the last few months i feel great pretty much

entries.speaker: ellie
entries.text: have you noticed any changes in your behavior or thoughts lately

entries.speaker: participant
entries.text: no not really i seem i think i seem a little happier more content lately

entries.speaker: ellie
entries.text: okay have you been diagnosed with depression

entries.speaker: participant
entries.text: i have had thought maybe in the past because i do have a family history of it and you know it was not anything real too debilitating and i was not able to really function on my own but i was concerned with it and sought counseling

entries.speaker: ellie
entries.text: do you feel like therapy is useful

entries.speaker: participant
entries.text: i do i was really against it in the past and until after i went i mean i wish i went more say during my my marriage over the course of my life now i think it is very useful however in the past i was one of those i grew up hearing that it was just ridiculous and it was a waste of money etcetera but i think it is a useful tool if you are open to it

entries.speaker: ellie
entries.text: what got you to seek help

entries.speaker: participant
entries.text: oh just some questions i wanted just an honest opinion outside of friends or strangers from a professional you know about life relationships and sometimes it is good talking things out with a a professional even though i would not see someone like you in real life i prefer someone who is older than i am a little more life experience than someone who is maybe younger
